content: *repeating row of lace crocheted in a beautiful heirloom blanket patons yarns * patons canadiana 100 g/3 5 oz or patons décor 100 g/3 5 oz 15 balls size 6 mm u s j or 10 crochet hook gauge 1 motif = 4 ins \ 10 cm square make 7 panels 15 squares each finishing sew panels together and add fringe written directions are provided in pdf download june 2009 also at knit and crochet now 1 1 https //www anniescatalog com/knitandcrochetnow/patterns/detail html pattern_id=259&series=2
